title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Wilderness

properties.name: description
properties.value: Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

content:
Contents

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 15 tasks available, there are a total of 150 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Sacrifice Some Bones at the Chaos Temple Sacrifice some Bones at the Western Chaos Temple altar. N/A N/A
Use the Abyss Use the Abyss to access a Runecrafting Altar. N/A Enter the Abyss (automatically completed )
Defeat a Lava Dragon in the Wilderness Defeat a Lava dragon in the Wilderness. N/A Optionally a knife or a slash weapon to slash webs or 52 Agility and Wilderness hard diary if meleeing, alternatively ranged or magic equipment
Defeat a Fire Giant in the Wilderness Defeat a Fire Giant in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat a Chaos Dwarf in the Wilderness Defeat a Chaos Dwarf in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat a Green Dragon in the Wilderness Defeat a Green Dragon in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Complete the Easy Wilderness Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Wilderness Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Order a Drink at the Old Nite Order a drink at The Old Nite. N/A 2 Coins
Use a Lever to Teleport to Edgeville Use the lever near the Mage Arena to teleport to Edgeville. N/A N/A
Pray at the Southern Chaos Temple Pray at the altar in the Southern Chaos Temple. N/A N/A
Pray at the Western Chaos Temple Pray at the altar in the Western Chaos Temple. N/A N/A
Enter the Wilderness Resource Area Enter the Wilderness Resource Area. N/A Up to 7,500 coins, less with Wilderness Diary
Enter the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon Enter the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon. N/A N/A
Use the Bank at the Mage Arena Use the bank at the Mage Arena. N/A Possibly a knife or a slash weapon to slash webs
Visit Ferox Enclave Visit Ferox Enclave. N/A N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 19 tasks available, there are a total of 950 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Sacrifice Some Dragon Bones at the Chaos Temple Sacrifice some Dragon bones at the Western Chaos Temple altar. N/A N/A
Bury Some Lava Dragon Bones Bury some Lava dragon bones. N/A N/A
Complete the Wilderness Agility Course Complete a lap of the Wilderness Agility Course. 52 Agility N/A
Catch a Black Salamander Catch a Black Salamander in the Wilderness. 67 Hunter N/A
Defeat the Crazy Archaeologist Defeat the Crazy Archaeologist in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat Scorpia Defeat Scorpia in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat the Chaos Fanatic Defeat the Chaos Fanatic in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat the Chaos Elemental Defeat the Chaos Elemental in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Equip a Fedora Equip a Fedora. N/A N/A
Obtain an Ecumenical Key Obtain an Ecumenical key as a drop in the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon. 60 Strength or 60 Agility N/A
Equip a Bracelet of Ethereum Equip a Bracelet of ethereum. N/A N/A
Equip a God Cape Equip either a Saradomin cape, a Guthix cape or Zamorak cape. N/A N/A
Cast Saradomin Strike Cast the Saradomin Strike spell outside of the Mage Arena. 60 Magic Completion of Mage Arena I miniquest
Cast Claws of Guthix Cast the Claws of Guthix spell outside of the Mage Arena. 60 Magic Completion of Mage Arena I miniquest
Cast Flames of Zamorak Cast the Flames of Zamorak spell outside of the Mage Arena. 60 Magic Completion of Mage Arena I miniquest
Complete the Medium Wilderness Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Wilderness Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Open a Looting Bag Open a looting bag. N/A N/A
Enter the Deep Wilderness Dungeon Enter the Deep Wilderness Dungeon. N/A N/A
Open One of Larran's Chests Open either Larran's small chest or Larran's big chest. N/A N/A

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 14 tasks available, there are a total of 1,400 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Catch 100 Dark Crabs Catch 100 Dark Crabs in the Wilderness. 85 Fishing N/A
Catch a Black Chinchompa Catch a Black Chinchompa in the Wilderness. 73 Hunter Need the Kandarin, Desert or Fremennik area unlocked
Craft an Air Battlestaff in the Wilderness Craft an air battlestaff in the Wilderness. 66 Crafting N/A
Defeat Venenatis Defeat Venenatis in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat Callisto Defeat Callisto in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat Vet'ion Defeat Vet'ion in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat the King Black Dragon Defeat the King Black Dragon in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Equip a Dragon Pickaxe Equip a dragon pickaxe. 60 Attack N/A
Equip a Dragon 2H Sword in the Wilderness Equip a dragon 2h sword in the Wilderness. 60 Attack N/A
Equip an Enchanted Slayer Staff Equip an Enchanted Slayer Staff. 75 Magic, 55 Slayer N/A
Trade With the Emblem Trader Trade an ancient medallion, an ancient effigy or an ancient relic with the Emblem Trader in the Forinthry Dungeon. N/A N/A
Imbue a God Cape Imbue either a Saradomin cape, a Guthix cape or Zamorak cape. N/A Completion of Mage Arena II miniquest
Complete the Hard Wilderness Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Wilderness Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip a Piece of the Dagon'Hai Set Equip any piece of the Dagon'hai robes set. 70 Magic, 40 Defence N/A

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 22 tasks available, there are a total of 5,500 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Cook a Dark Crab Cook a Dark Crab. 90 Cooking N/A
Make an Extended Antifire Potion Make an extended antifire potion. 84 Herblore Wildernessâœ“[note 1]
Equip 250 Black Chinchompas Equip a stack of at least 250 Black Chinchompas. 73 Hunter, 65 Ranged Need the Kandarin, Desert or Fremennik area unlocked
Equip 500 Black Chinchompas Equip a stack of at least 500 Black Chinchompas. 73 Hunter, 65 Ranged Need the Kandarin, Desert or Fremennik area unlocked
Equip 1000 Black Chinchompas Equip a stack of at least 1000 Black Chinchompas. 73 Hunter, 65 Ranged Need the Kandarin, Desert or Fremennik area unlocked
Mine Some Runite Ore in the Wilderness Mine some Runite Ore in the Wilderness. 85 Mining N/A
Equip a Treasonous Ring Equip a Treasonous ring. N/A N/A
Equip a Tyrannical Ring Equip a Tyrannical ring. N/A N/A
Equip a Ring of the Gods Equip a Ring of the gods. N/A N/A
Equip a Craw's Bow Equip a Craw's Bow. 60 Ranged N/A
Equip a Viggora's Chainmace Equip a Viggora's Chainmace. 60 Attack N/A
Equip a Thammaron's Sceptre Equip a Thammaron's Sceptre. 60 Magic N/A
Defeat the Corporeal Beast Defeat the Corporeal Beast in the Wilderness. N/A N/A
Defeat the Corporeal Beast 100 Times Defeat the Corporeal Beast in the Wilderness 100 times. N/A N/A
Defeat the Corporeal Beast 250 Times Defeat the Corporeal Beast in the Wilderness 250 times. N/A N/A
Defeat the Corporeal Beast 500 Times Defeat the Corporeal Beast in the Wilderness 500 times. N/A N/A
Equip a Blessed Spirit Shield Equip a Blessed Spirit Shield. 70 Defence, 60 Prayer N/A
Equip a Malediction Ward Equip a Malediction Ward. 60 Defence N/A
Equip an Odium Ward Equip an Odium Ward. 60 Defence N/A
Build an Obelisk Build an obelisk in your Player Owned House. 80 Construction Need the Fremennik area unlocked.
Complete the Elite Wilderness Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Wilderness Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip a Full Dagon'Hai Set Equip a full set of Dagon'hai robes. 70 Magic, 40 Defence N/A
  1. ^ Although players may be able to create extended antifire potions without unlocking the Wilderness region, doing so does not complete this task.

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 4 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Equip a Spectral or Arcane Spirit Shield Equip either a Spectral Spirit Shield or an Arcane Spirit Shield. 75 Defence, 70 Prayer, 65 Magic N/A
Equip an Elysian Spirit Shield Equip an Elysian Spirit Shield. 75 Defence, 75 Prayer N/A
Obtain Every Revenant Weapon Obtain Craw's Bow, Viggora's Chainmace and Thammaron's Sceptre as drops from Revenants. N/A N/A
Equip an Amulet of Eternal Glory Equip an amulet of eternal glory. N/A Completion of Heroes' Quest (auto-completed for ).

Note: Players with Eternal Jeweller Relic have no way to uncharge a charged amulet of glory.
